General.Name: Riverstone Energy Ltd
General.Description: Riverstone Energy Limited specializes in buyout. It prefers to make investments in energy companies focusing decarbonisation, midstream exploration, production, power, renewable energy, storage, and transportation of oil and gas. The fund seeks to invest globally focusing in North America, Continental U.S., Western Canada, Gulf of Mexico and Europe. It prefers to take majority stake in its portfolio companies.
General.Address: 712 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10019
